page.title: 09RECREATION _ A CRAZE-BMXing
page.content: A large number of children in our area own{BMX bikes.}BMXing started in the{U.S.A. in 1969.}BMX stands for {Bicycle Moto Cross.}The bike has a low angled frame and sometimes is made of Reynolds 530 tubing to make it lighter and stronger. The cheap frames are made of steel. It has two cogs, a front and a back cog, joined by a chain. It has one gear only. There are many different kinds of wheels. BMXing consists of{racing}and {freestyle.}In{freestyle}you manoeuvre the bike on the back or front wheel, or jump with or without a ramp, etc. You can flick out the back wheel in mid air if you are good. In{racing, you race the bike as fast as you can around a short rough track. You compete against about 7 other riders in what is called a moto. The first rider to finish wins.
